cron-schedule: "formatId filter (regex); suite id; node id; D1 node base url; harvest begin date; harvest increment (days);solr location;requestCount"

task-type: # - task type: currently only 'quality' jobs are supported.
# - job group: currently only 'metadig' is used
#   - formatId filter (regex): This is a list of wildcards that will match records harvest
#   - suite id: the metadig suite id
#   - node id: the DataONE node URN
#   - D1 node base url: the base service URL for an MN or CN
#   - harvest begin date: the first date to use for the DataONE 'listObjects' service
#   - harvest increment (days): the time span for each search
#   - requestCount: the number of itmes to request from DataONE listObjects
#   - aggregationId: the unique id of the item to create the aggregated report for (e.g. DataONE project SID)
#   - aggregationName: the unique name of the aggregation to create the report for (e.g. DataONE project name)
# Entry for creating aggregated graphs for a DataONE project
